last_episode_to_air.name: Winners Are Grinners
last_episode_to_air.overview: The fate of the castle hangs in the balance as Hermann closes in to take control!

name: In your Dreams
overview: Sam and Ben must decide between family loyalty and following their own dreams.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: Teenage twins Sam and Ben Hazelton are abruptly uprooted from their normal, Australian, suburban existence and despatched to Germany for four months to live with some relatives they've only vaguely heard about. To their great surprise, they discover that their hosts are an eccentric family of faded aristocrats who live in an ancient castle in a remote, rural region. It's soon apparent that mayhem and chaos are the order of the day and that only one rule is likely to apply during their stay — always expect the unexpected!

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: Ben now is the Baron, but is he up for his new role? In the second season, he will be torn between Australia and Germany even more. Meanwhile, things are looking up for Lucy, Jack and Sam. Their band is off to a good start and they are excited to take it to the next level.

episodes.name: Into the Unknown
episodes.overview: Teenage twins suddenly find their lives upended when they stay with eccentric relatives in an ancient castle.

episodes.name: New Life in an Old World
episodes.overview: Thieves and bank managers; Sam struggles to spot the difference.

episodes.name: Sam Rocks the Castle
episodes.overview: When Lili calls for some big ideas, Sam and Ben try to oblige.

episodes.name: Ghosts, Ghouls and Rats
episodes.overview: A rat spooks Philipp and a spook rattles Sam.

episodes.name: Family Ties
episodes.overview: Rival family members threaten to take over the castle.

episodes.name: History Past and Future
episodes.overview: Sophie inspires Ben to look at history through new eyes.

episodes.name: Episode 7
episodes.overview: Sam is suddenly an internet singing sensation but Jack and Lucy aren't impressed.

episodes.name: Episode 8
episodes.overview: Ben discovers that small towns can harbour big family feuds.

episodes.name: Episode 9
episodes.overview: Sophie puts her trust in Ben's outdoor skills - and soon wishes she hadn't.

episodes.name: Episode 10
episodes.overview: Lili's plans to impress a group of young aristocrats are thrown into turmoil by the arrival of the sheriff.

episodes.name: Episode 11
episodes.overview: Marcus is confused about his feelings for Sam while Sam is just plain confused.

episodes.name: Episode 12
episodes.overview: Ben confronts some unique aspects of German culture and Sophie confronts some unique aspects of Ben.

episodes.name: Episode 13
episodes.overview: Making a simple song video turns into an extremely complicated Chinese puzzle.

episodes.name: Episode 14
episodes.overview: Philipp's grand idea of hosting a Murder Mystery Night becomes a lot more than he bargained for.

episodes.name: Episode 15
episodes.overview: A government order to restore an old tower gives Hermann the excuse he needs to take over the castle.

episodes.name: Episode 16
episodes.overview: Sam's band gets a new name and Philipp and Lili get an unwanted surprise.

episodes.name: Episode 17
episodes.overview: Lili's taste for fashion gets her locked up while Ben experiences the weekend from hell.

episodes.name: Episode 18
episodes.overview: Jack's math results threaten to derail his music career while Ben has a dog day afternoon.

episodes.name: Episode 19
episodes.overview: A trip to a dance party in the city sees Ben's world come crashing down around him.

episodes.name: Episode 20
episodes.overview: All the castle's problems seem to be solved when rock star and golfing nut, Johnny Brave walks through the gates.

episodes.name: Episode 21
episodes.overview: Sam gets an offer she can't refuse but does while Ben gets an offer he wants to refuse but can't.

episodes.name: Episode 22
episodes.overview: Ben discovers that even in a castle with hundreds of rooms, it's not easy to hide two Swedish backpackers.

episodes.name: Episode 23
episodes.overview: People go missing on both sides of the planet and Sam thinks it's all her fault.

episodes.name: Episode 24
episodes.overview: Jack's new girlfriend threatens to break up the band and Sam and Lucy are at a loss what to do.

episodes.name: Episode 25
episodes.overview: Ben and Sam uncover some family secrets that will change their lives forever.

episodes.name: Episode 26
episodes.overview: Ben's caught in a trap but when Marcus shows him a way out, he's not sure if he can take it.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: Teenage twins Sam and Ben Hazelton are abruptly uprooted from their normal, Australian, suburban existence and despatched to Germany for four months to live with some relatives they've only vaguely heard about. To their great surprise, they discover that their hosts are an eccentric family of faded aristocrats who live in an ancient castle in a remote, rural region. It's soon apparent that mayhem and chaos are the order of the day and that only one rule is likely to apply during their stay — always expect the unexpected!

episodes.name: The Trap Is Sprung
episodes.overview: Teenage twins, Sam and Ben find their lives upended once more by the surprise arrival of their eccentric relatives from Germany.

episodes.name: Lili's Grand Plan
episodes.overview: Sam and Ben must decide between family loyalty and following their own dreams.

episodes.name: Ben Takes Command
episodes.overview: Sam, Ben and Lili arrive in Germany only to find themselves locked out of the castle.

episodes.name: It's a Dog's Life
episodes.overview: Ben judges the local dog show, as Sam makes a discovery that leaves the band in the dog house!

episodes.name: Bad Music Is Good Music
episodes.overview: Sophie goes on a rescue mission to stop Philipp from landing back in gaol.

episodes.name: Lili Cooks Up a Storm
episodes.overview: Lili's dream to revamp the castle café soon becomes a nightmare for everyone.

episodes.name: To Catch a Thief
episodes.overview: Ben displays his new magic tricks - but will they be enough to thwart Hermann's latest scheme to take over the castle?

episodes.name: Sam Meets Her Match
episodes.overview: Sam finds musical inspiration with a local boy, putting the future of the band in jeopardy.

episodes.name: Unreal Reality
episodes.overview: Reality TV comes to the castle and Lili gets a reality check!

episodes.name: Old Love, New Love
episodes.overview: Sophie and Ben find that maintaining a long distance relationship isn't easy.

episodes.name: The Great Cat Feud
episodes.overview: Sam's musical plans are disrupted by a feud between two village café owners.

episodes.name: True Confessions
episodes.overview: It's clear that Jack likes Sophie but can he face up to telling Ben?

episodes.name: Jack and Lucy to the Rescue
episodes.overview: The teens band together on both sides of the globe to save Philipp from another of Hermann's traps.

episodes.name: Mia Kicks a Goal
episodes.overview: A small town soccer game becomes a battleground with high stakes for Ben.

episodes.name: The Princess Goes to the Ball
episodes.overview: Lili needs a date for the ball so Sam and Marcus decide to play Cupid.

episodes.name: Fun at the Fair
episodes.overview: It's the annual medieval fair at the castle but as always, nothing goes to plan.

episodes.name: Double Dating's Dangers
episodes.overview: Sam and Marcus go on a double date to a fun park which turns out to be anything but fun.

episodes.name: Lili's Dream Is Ben's Nightmare
episodes.overview: Ben manages to solve one problem by turning it into an even bigger one!

episodes.name: Horses for Courses
episodes.overview: The band is given a great opportunity – only for Jack to throw it into jeopardy.

episodes.name: Great Work!...We Think
episodes.overview: Jack and Lucy face the challenge of how to raise money for their trip to Germany.

episodes.name: Sam and Ben Bomb Out
episodes.overview: The band gets ready for their big audition – only to discover they have nowhere to rehearse.

episodes.name: A Band or a Brand?
episodes.overview: Sam, Jack and Lucy discover that becoming a successful band is not just about their music.

episodes.name: Big Brother Is Watching
episodes.overview: Philipp's brilliant idea to improve the castle's security proves to be a lot less brilliant in practice.

episodes.name: Desperate and Dateless
episodes.overview: A local Dance Competition challenges Sam and Marcus in more ways than one.

episodes.name: Money, Mayhem and Mystery
episodes.overview: The day of Philipp's trial arrives - and a brief taste of freedom quickly turn sour.

episodes.name: Winners Are Grinners
episodes.overview: The fate of the castle hangs in the balance as Hermann closes in to take control!

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: Ben now is the Baron, but is he up for his new role? In the second season, he will be torn between Australia and Germany even more. Meanwhile, things are looking up for Lucy, Jack and Sam. Their band is off to a good start and they are excited to take it to the next level.
